section.title: Names and Trademarks
section.p: All company names, organization names, license names, and product names mentioned in this documentation are used for identification purposes only. A trademark is explicitly identified as registered or unregistered trademark only if required by appropriate guidelines or license terms.

section.title: Warranty and Liability
section.p: The individual open source warranty or liability disclaimers indemnify the original authors of the individual components. Warranties and liabilities declared on the offering by ${organization.name} are subject to additional terms of use and are not affected (neither reduced nor extended) by the individual disclaimers of the used open source components.

section.title: Availability of Source Code
section.p: This software distribution annex covers the corresponding source code of the used open source components.
In case you regard the provision of source code to be inaccurate or incomplete please address your source code request to your point of contact for the given software distribution

Please note, that ${organization.name} is only obliged to make source code available in case the effective license demands such provisioning within a given period of time after you obtaining the software.

body.p: This documentation is protected by copyright ${document.copyright.year}, ${organization.name}.
